alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Polk County through 330 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Auburndale, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Haines City, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Jan Phyl Village, Combee Settlement, Lake Alfred, Dundee, Davenport, Eagle Lake, Polk City, Lake Hamilton, Inwood, Cypress Gardens, Winter Haven Airport, Bartow Municipal Airport, Loughman and Wahneta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
